ANNOUNCEMENT: Early Career Office Hours 
 I didn't go to Exeter, I didn't go to Harvard and yet somehow managed to join Anduril early which changed the trajectory of my life. 
  Most people fail not because they lack the capabilities but because they make sub-optimal choices ...

Everyone thinks the paths to wealth are: Building a startup. Going into finance. Investing in real estate. Inheriting it. But there's an opportunity most overlook.. Buying a small business (yes, even a porta potty business...):
